summary: This document is an application to the United States District Court for an order authorizing the use of a pen register and trap-and-trace device on a specific telephone number as part of a criminal investigation by the FBI. The application outlines the legal basis for the request and the technical details of how the pen register and trap-and-trace device will operate.

persons.name: Alex Rossmiller
persons.context: Alex Rossmiller affirms the application for the installation and use of a pen register and trap-and-trace device in connection with an ongoing investigation.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Geoffrey S. Berman is mentioned as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York, under whom Alex Rossmiller works.

persons.name: FNU LNU
persons.context: FNU LNU is referenced as one of the target subjects of the investigation related to possible violations of federal law.

connections.description: Alex Rossmiller works under Geoffrey S. Berman as part of the United States Attorney's Office.
Alex Rossmiller is involved in the investigation of FNU LNU as part of the application for the pen register and trap-and-trace device.

events.title: Application for Pen Register and Trap-and-Trace Device
events.description: The Government filed an application to authorize the use of a pen register and trap-and-trace device on a specific phone number as part of an ongoing criminal investigation.

keyFacts: The application seeks to install a pen register and trap-and-trace device on the phone number 917-520-3106, associated with the Terramar Project.
The investigation is being conducted by the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) regarding possible violations of 21 U.S.C. ยง 1591.
The pen register and trap-and-trace device will collect phone numbers and IP addresses but not the contents of communications.
The order is requested to be effective for a period of 60 days from the date of the order.
The document includes a request for the provider to maintain confidentiality regarding the investigation.
